PIF and workspace .log files are available upon request

Steps to reproduce:
1, Launch Eclipse with a new workspace
2, Import the PIF and wait until auto-build completes
3, Get the build error pop-up with the AssertionFailedException in workspace .log:

The PIF builds error free on Eclipse 3.0.2, so it should not produce the error on Eclipse 3.2.2
In the attached log I can see lot of errors related to webtools.
